description: This renowned restaurant occupying an old mill with rustic yet elegant decor has recently been taken over by new chefs who have come here from elsewhere in Versilia. The menu offers a selection of fish and meat dishes, all of which are prepared in the same modern and unfussy style.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Maestro', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
